nodes.text: The Luxury, also known as The Luxury, was a luxurious liner that was used during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

The Luxury was owned by the Ithorian Veer. During the Clone Wars, he hired it out to the Sentient Beings Opposing Violence, who planned to hold a peace summit on board it, in the Cularin system. However, the Dark Jedi Raik Muun attacked the summit with battle droids and t'salaks. She was eventually defeated by the Heroes of Cularin, although not before Jedi Master Kirlocca had been killed. The ship was severely damaged by the battle and the Thaereian military sent over engineers to try and repair it.
